background: The Department of Water Resources is mandated to collect real-time (e.g. 15-min interval) water quality data at key sites in the the San Francisco Bay Delta in compliance with Water Resources Decision D-1641. This procedure explains how to collect real time water quality monitoring data using an Xylem EXO sonde.
title: DWR Real time water quality data collection
objectives: Calibrate, deploy, retrieve, quality assure, and report real time water quality data.
